description.p: Fauxdacious is an open source media player. A fork of Audacious, Fauxdacious plays your music, videos, CDs and DVDs how you want, without stealing away your computer's resources from other tasks.

Drag and drop folders and individual song files, search for artists and albums in your entire music library, or create and edit your own custom playlists. Listen to CDs or stream music from the Internet. Tweak the sound with the graphical equalizer or experiment with LADSPA effects. Enjoy the modern GTK or Qt-themed interfaces or change things up with Winamp Classic skins. Use the plugins included with Fauxdacious to fetch lyrics and album-art covers for your music, to set an alarm in the morning, and more.
